mapper.select: SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,group_step,group_id,name,num FROM (SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,regdate,hit,group_step,group_id,name,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,regdate,hit,group_step,group_id,name FROM replyboard WHERE group_step!=1 ORDER BY group_id DESC , group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT group_id,group_step FROM replyboard WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM replyboard WHERE group_id=#{group_id} AND group_step=1
mapper.update: UPDATE replyboard SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM replyboard WHERE no=#{no} AND isreply=1
